name: BOMB DEFUSAL 101
description:
Defusing bombs ain't an easy job. You run the risk of blowing to pieces every day you show up to work! But what if death stopped being a problem? What if no matter what happens to you, you will still wake up to see the next day, unharmed?  Would you accept? This is the question Myo Hassa had to ask himself after getting accidentally involved in the biggest dispute of the divine world. 

Help him find out the correct decision by keeping him out of trouble in this exciting adventure game where nothing is what it seems.

IMPORTANT!

This game was created using a very old engine called 3DRAD.

It was discontinued years ago and as such it has tons of technical problems that have never been fixed, you've been warned.
